thread.title: Cecile van Berkum
thread.title_full: TrustedHousesitters reviewed by Cecile van Berkum

author: Cecile van Berkum
title: Cecile van Berkum
text: TrustedHousesittes provides a service that makes it posible to travel and enjoy other places for both the sitters and the home owners. And they do provide it with security and service. We are very happy with TrustedHousesitters and fully recommend!
